foods.name: Mango Kulfi Smoothie Bowl

indian_wisdom.title: The Indian Connection
indian_wisdom.description: Indian cuisine has always understood the deep connection between food and emotions. From the warming comfort of dal chawal to the cooling relief of cucumber raita, every dish is designed to balance both body and mind.
ayurvedic_principles: Vata (Air + Space): Warm, grounding foods for anxiety and restlessness
Pitta (Fire + Water): Cooling, sweet foods for anger and irritability
Kapha (Earth + Water): Light, spicy foods for depression and lethargy
indian_wisdom.spice_science: Indian spices aren't just flavor enhancers - they're mood medicine. Turmeric fights depression, cardamom lifts spirits, ashwagandha reduces stress, and saffron brightens mood naturally.
